name: Ropemaker
description: A craftsman who twists fibers into ropes and cords; adventurers can purchase climbing gear, commission special bindings, or learn about knots and maritime supplies.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the earthy scent of hemp and the rhythmic sound of rope being twisted and braided. The air carries the promise of strength and the essential nature of maritime supplies, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of skilled craftsmanship and the importance of reliable equipment for dangerous work.
